title: Jakson Engineers plans Rs 2,000 cr investment to expand solar manufacturing biz
description: Jakson Engineers plans to invest Rs 2,000 crore to expand its solar manufacturing business. The investment will establish a 2,500 MW solar cell facility and expand the existing module plant to 2,000 MW. This move aims to meet growing solar energy demand and create 1,200 new jobs.
